verse: पंकाभिषिक्त सकलावयवं विलोक्य दामोदरं वदति कोपवशात्य यशोदा । त्वं सूकरोऽसि गतजन्मनि पूतनारे ।
meaning: पंकाभिषिक्त – covered in mudसकलावयवं – all limbs/body partsविलोक्य – seeingदामोदरं – Lord Krishna, who has a cord tied around his waistवदति – saysकोपवशात्य – due to angerयशोदा – Yashoda (Krishna's foster mother)त्वं – youसूकरोऽसि – you are a pigगतजन्मनि – in a previous lifeपूतनारे – O demon named PutanaMeaning:Yashoda, in her anger, sees Lord Krishna covered in mud and says, "You are a pig, O demon named Putana who was reborn."
